content: this pattern does not require any sewing included in the instant download is the pattern instruction pdf file written in english us terminology on how to make your mini octopus required skills magic_ring chain slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet increase half_double_crochet increase single_crochet invisible decrease work in back loop only work in front loop only materials used hook us 4mm yarn myboshi samt safety eyes 18mm if you have any questions about this pattern please do not hesitate to contact me copyright © 2024 the content of this document is not to be copied reproduced altered published or distributed in any way you can sell finished products made with this model provided it is accredited to pandami crochet
